attributes.action: By pass the a77 from stranraer through to ayr.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There was 20 deaths and 95 serious injuries on the stretch between January 2000 and December 2004 and there have been many more since. The road is just not suitable for the ammount and type of traffic it sees. Trucks coming from the ferries have the negotiate thin winding country roads and in Girvan a one way road through the heart of the town. The difficult to negotiate roads mixed with speeding and large vehicles makes this a very dangerous road. If it where by passed there would be no need to speed as it would be a straight road and there would be more room for cars and trucks to negotiate the road safely.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
